title: SJBs Harin Fernando decided to go Independent
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Samagi Jana Balavegaya MP Harin Fernando has decided to become an independent Member of Parliament.
He told reporters on Wednesday (11) that he would work with whatever group that takes control of the government for the betterment of the country.
“My opinion is that we cannot waste more time given the situation in the country. And we need to reach common ground,” said MP Harin Fernando.
Curfew to be imposed at 2 PM & lifted at 6 AM on Friday (13)
